p.k: Mikko Franck conducts the Orchestre de Paris and soloist Nora Gubisch in an attractive concert prorgramme, exclusively dedicated to compositions of the French impressionist Maurice Ravel (1875-1937). This performance was recorded 2012 at the Salle Pleyel in Paris.
p.d: Mikko Franck conducts the Orchestre de Paris in an attractive concert prorgramme, exclusively dedicated to compositions of the French impressionist Maurice Ravel (1875-1937). The soloist of this performance is mezzo-soprano Nora Gubisch. Together, they interprete Ravel's 'Une barque sur l'océan', 'Alborada del gracioso', the Shéhérazade cycle and ballet music from Daphnis et Chloé. This performance was recorded 2012 at the Salle Pleyel in Paris.
